lead_paragraph: His travels to three crucial states were part victory lap and part nostalgia tour. But his core mission was to rally voters behind Hillary Clinton — or see his agenda defeated.

byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis reported from Ann Arbor, Mich., and Gardiner Harris from Durham, N.H.
byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and GARDINER HARRIS

headline.print_headline: An Energized Obama Stumps for Clinton, and His Own Legacy
headline.main: ‘Fired Up’ Obama Makes Final Push for Clinton, and His Legacy

snippet: His travels to three crucial states were part victory lap and part nostalgia tour. But his core mission was to rally voters behind Hillary Clinton — or see his agenda defeated....
abstract: Pres Obama's participation on campaign trail in final days of 2016 election cycle has been part victory lap and part nostalgia tour; Obama implores voters to rally to Hillary Clinton's candidacy, which will serve to preserve his legacy.
